value: return state !== "completed" && state !== "skipped" && state !== "initializing" && state !== "executing" && (type === "USER_TASK" || type === "MANUAL_TASK" || type === "HUMAN_TASK");
return user.firstname && user.lastname ? user.firstname + " " + user.lastname : user.userName;
return '';
return '';
var tooltip = "Do the task for the assignee.";
tooltip = "In order to do the task for the assignee, you need to assign the task first.";
return uiTranslate("This task is not assigned anymore. Assign it and try again.");
return uiTranslate("An internal error occurred. Try again later. You can also check the log file.");

description: This page provides the detail information of a task. It is dedicated to Admin-like profiles. You can export it and edit it in the UI Designer. This page can only be used as an orphan page as it needs an 'id' parameter to display some content.
